mapper.select: select count(quota_entry_id) from e_quota_entry where creation_date = date('now', 'localtime')

select q.quota_entry_id, q.creation_date, q.total_amount, q.invoice_type, q.drawer, q.partner_company_id, c.abbreviated_name as company_abbreviated_name, c.full_name as company_full_name, c.phone as company_phone, q.remark, q.is_modified from e_quota_entry as q join c_partner_company as c on q.partner_company_id = c.partner_company_id where q.partner_company_id = #{id} order by q.quota_entry_id desc
mapper.update: update e_quota_entry set total_amount = #{totalAmount}, invoice_type = #{invoiceType}, remark = #{remark}, is_modified = 1 where quota_entry_id = #{quotaEntryID}

update e_quota_product set quantity = #{quantity}, remark = #{remark}, tax_rate = #{taxRate}, unit_price_without_tax = #{unitPriceWithoutTax}, unit_price_with_tax = #{unitPriceWithTax} where quota_product_id = #{quotaProductID}
